comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: I haven't used Facebook in a long time, although I still have the account. It serves for example to get in touch with people you haven't heard from for a long time. But their numbers are down:Facebook's user numbers shrunk for the first time in its history.Younger people use Instagram, although you can have both accounts linked.I think the move to buy other companies like Instagram and Whatsapp is also a way to diversify in the face of the danger that in the long term Facebook will lose many users or end up disappearing.

comments.author: robattfield
comments.body: More personal problems from someone not responding to demand. Also, I have not used FB as a personal medium, but I still have to agree that it is still more popular regardless of social background today . And whether they are losing users more and more or have other orientations related to it, it is too macroscopic that I can't know yet. However, if one day, maybe this never happens, it will still be a good tool for people to use and connect with each other.
